236: Job Details Job Location Hampton Inn & Suites, Lynnwood - Lynnwood, WA Position Type Full-Time/Part-Time Education Level None Travel Percentage No travel required Job Category Hospitality - Hotel Description Works with the Front Office management team to deliver an exceptional experience to our guests. As the Night Auditor you ensure the proper accuracy and updating of our reporting systems including the property management systems, accounting software, credit card transactions and cash balancing. From check in to check out you are often the first or last impression. You are the hub of communication. You relay our guests questions and needs to the other departments, shifts and management staff to deliver on the hotels standards and service expectations. Checking guests in and out accurately, ensuring proper credit is obtained. Making reservations and upselling as appropriate. Ensuring proper handling of credit cards, cash and other forms of billing/payments. Answer phone calls, proficiently use the computer and other technologies. Ability to act as a concierge and perform your duties while always providing exceptional guest service.
